review.comment: Excellent advice and service provided – truly an example of Trusted Advisors. Entire team, but mostly I am highlighting Ruslan (Managing Director), communicate their expertise clearly and listen/consult with myself as client even though they are clearly the experts in the conversation. Communications and turnarounds were very prompt and diligent, I must say I was impressed with the level of efficiency. I can say that Ruslan takes a strong position for his clients. Both of my cases (for my little daughter and for myself) have been handled with superior standards. I am very grateful!

Ruslan Ughrelidze is a true professional. I once again would like to thank him. He handled my application excellently. The most I am impressed with is that Ruslan, despite of his super tight schedule, always stays on top of all important points and never leaves them unexplained - such a great comfort to have such solicitor handling your application. Many thanks and my very best wishes!

I would like to express my appreciation for providing bespoke services, I felt that my solicitor took care of my applications and handled them highly professionally!

I would also like to highlight Ruslan’s attitude - I never felt that he has no time for all my questions, I never felt that I could not understand something as he simplified every complex legal structure, so that I could make sound decisions.

I am grateful!
Extremely experienced, professional, and friendly personnel, they've helped me and my family in getting our visas to the UK for the past decade. Can't recommend them enough!

Lawlex Solicitors is a very professional law firm. They take care of the clients in every way and follow all legal matters thoroughly. In my opinion, having a lawyer who is consistent and supportive of everything in a legal issue is more important. My lawsuit was about delays from the immigration office because my case took longer than it was supposed to. Following footsteps of Lawlex with the UK Immigration Service, I was able to obtain a residence permit. Thank you very much. I highly recommend this law firm to everyone.

Lawlex Solicitors is a massive help towards your visa applications; it does not matter how old you are, or which visa you are applying for, Lawlex helps you out. Personally, when I first came to the UK, my parents and I did now know how the visa applications go like in the UK, when to go to the home office, how often to re-new the visa and all of the small and big issues within a visa. Lawlex and especially Ms Maryam Najmi, helped out a lot.
I highly recommend this Law Firm to everyone needs UK Visa.

I’m really thankful for the constant help I receive from the Lawlex. I've needed their services for the past two years, and they've always exceeded my expectations. They are always accessible to help immediately and with a great level of professionalism whenever I need them.
review.review_reply: Thank you for leaving us positive feedback. We very much appreciate that and strive to meet our clients' expectations.

review.comment: My and my son's solicitor, Ruslan Ughrelidze is a real professional for his work. He worked on our two cases, he had done excellent work. Me and my son are very thankful to Ruslan Ughrelidze, whoever has a problem, we would recommend Ruslan Ughrelidze, and we were confident that you would get a positive result. Thank you so much, Ruslan, for everything.

review.comment: I could not be any happier with the services that I received from Lawlex; I had used their immigration services. Everything has been flawless and very relaxing for me. I recently approached Lawlex Solicitors regarding a matter of immigration which we had been pursuing for some time without success. The advice we received from Lawlex Solicitors was both honest and pragmatic. Due to their efforts this matter has now been resolved fully. It is reassuring to know that we can call on their expertise in all matters legal, and of course I would have no hesitation in using their services again, and in recommending them to friends and colleagues
